title: Apple WWDC 2024 keynote in 18 minutes
description: Apple just wrapped WWDC 2024 and it was packed with announcements, including a more customizable homescreen on iOS 18 and updates across iPadOS, macOS, and visionOS 2. Apple unveiled a new Passwords app for managing login details across devices and showcased new accessibility features for AirPods. And the long-awaited calculator app for iPad is finally here after 14 years. We also got a first look at Apple Intelligence'' Apples name for a new suite of AI features with some new features that could address privacy and security concerns like Private Cloud Compute. Here's everything you missed. #Apple #WWDC #Technology   Biggest Apple Intelligence announcements from WWDC 2024:   0:00 visionOS 2 1:25 iOS 18 6:51 AirPods updates 7:15 Apple TV's new Insight feature 7:42 watchOS 11 9:48 iPadOS 18 11:26 macOS Sequoia 13:52 Apple Intelligence  Subscribe:  Like The Verge on Facebook:  Follow on Twitter:  Follow on Instagram:  Follow on TikTok:   The Vergecast Podcast:  Decoder with Nilay Patel:   More about our podcasts:   Read More:  Community guidelines:  Wallpapers from The Verge:   Subscribe to The Vergecast on YouTube, new episodes on Tuesday and Friday:
